text: John Mackie Wren (26 April 1936 - 13 August 2020) was a Scottish footballer who played for Hibernian, Rotherham United, Stirling Albion and Berwick Rangers. He later emigrated to South Africa and played for Hellenic F.C. and Cape Town City. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:People from Bonnybridge Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Bo'ness United F.C. players Category:Hibernian F.C. players Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:Stirling Albion F.C. players Category:Berwick Rangers F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Falkirk (council area) Category:Scottish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate soccer players in South Africa Category:Scottish expatriate sportspeople in South Africa Category:Hellenic F.C. players Category:Cape Town City F.C. (NFL) players
title: Jackie Wren
